projects.title: Multi Modal Listing (MML)
projects.description: Led development of an AI-enhanced product listing feature in Android using server-based and on-device AI models. Reduced listing time and improved seller acquisition.

projects.title: Android App Modernization at VMware
projects.description: Refactored large Java codebases to Kotlin, introduced Room DB, improved test coverage and CI/CD pipelines, and enforced architectural best practices.

projects.title: Payment SDK at Carousell
projects.description: Designed and implemented a payment SDK in Kotlin, reducing integration time for merchants and enabling scalability across multiple apps.

projects.title: Image Moderation Pipeline at Carousell
projects.description: Developed a gRPC based image moderation pipeline using Protobuf, enhancing safety for users.

projects.title: Personal Projects
projects.description: Created Android apps using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose, exploring UI/UX design and app architecture.

patents.title: Reserving physical resources based upon a physical identifier

certifications_or_extras.education: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication, PESIT, VTU
journals_or_publications: Bottom Navigation and Navigation Drawer Using Scaffold from Jetpack Compose

questions.question: Describe your experience building RESTful APIs using Django and DRF.
How have you optimized database queries and application performance in past projects?
Explain your approach to implementing authentication and authorization in a Django application.
Describe your experience with PostgreSQL. What are some common performance issues and how did you address them?
How have you used Redis in previous projects? What use cases did it address?
Explain how you would implement unit and integration tests for a Django REST API endpoint.
Describe your experience with Celery and message queues. How would you use them to solve a specific problem?
Given a list of integers, write a function to find the sum of all even numbers in the list.
